name: 5th Recycling & Waste Management conference
content: The 5th edition of the Recycling & Waste Management conference will be organized in Osaka, Japan, May 21-22, 2021\. Recycling 2021, aims to gather the most elegant societies and industries along with renowned and honorable persons from top universities across the globe. Recycling 2021, on behalf of its organizing Committee, welcomes all the Recycling researchers, industrialists, young scientists as well as student and corporate delegates to participate and to have a great experience.
